answers.answer: I'm not in the exact same situation as you but I feel your worry. I had a tubaligation and am now pregnant and waiting to see where my baby is located. I worry that I'm stressing too much. Sounds like you have done great so far. I'm praying for you! Good luck :)
thanks a lot i am praying that your pregnancy goes well also

First of srry for you lost and congrats on your blessing .. Im a ftm & I had a still birth last yr at 20 wks & I was devastated we started trying right away & I thought I would never be pregnant & here I am 34 wks this sat. Honestly I know it's hard not to worry but stress free is the way to be its good for you & baby .. Pray that everything will be ok and let god take care of the rest if you feel anything is wrong go to the ER I lost count of how many times I went it never hurts to go and check things out plus it calmed me .. I can't lie i still worry a little now about birth and everything being ok but I'm optimistic & great full that god has allowed me to get this far ... Pray stay happy and healthy and good luck Hun (:

I'm very sorry for your loss. I to had a miscarriage about 7 months ago. I am now 15 weeks along and have been suffering with those same fears. I'm hoping that once I start feeling this baby really move daily that it will ease my worries. Hang in there. You are in my prayers.

I also had 2 miscarriages one at 21 I was 7 weeks my second was at 25 I had a missed miscarriage I carried to 13 weeks but the baby had stopped growing at 7 weeks. I was pregnant a year later and carried to 35 weeks I had preeclampsia and had to be induced. He was born 4lbs 12ozs and was healthy. I think I was to stressed out while pregnant with him. So try your best not to stress. It may help you to buy a sonoline b heart Doppler. It will help ease worry. Good luck God bless and Congratulations.

I miscarried twins at 9 weeks last summer. I'm currently 31 weeks and everything is.going good so far. I had a lot of anxiety about miscarriage in the beginning & I talked to my OB.about it. He has done an ulyra.sound at every appointment and told me that if I have any concerns at all to call and he's more than willing to have me come in to check out me and the baby.Have you thought about buying one of those machines that let you listen to the baby's heartbeat? I haven't bought one, but they're about $20 and my OB told me if I buy one, he wants me to bring it in so he can be sure I'm putting.I'm the right place.I wish you all the best!
Thankyou! and I'm sure everything will turn out great :) I will keep checking to see how your doing :-)

hi all thanks for all your concern and blessings I have finally started to feel the baby move and i'm a little less stressed out, its still early so the movements are not as strong but it sure has me feeling better i have ordered a fetal Doppler so that should ease some stress also....all the best to you guys i'll keep you all informed

question: I have had 2 miscarriages and I'm currently pregnant again however I have not been able to enjoy this pregnancy as I am constantly worrying that something might go wrong again, I am currently in my 15th week and I don't feel I will ever begin to enjoy it......I want so much to enjoy it but I am so scared any advice??
title: pregnancy worries
